resources.string: Winterfell is the ancestral seat of power of House Stark, the Wardens of the North.
Casterly Rock is the ancestral seat of power of House Tyrell, Wardens of the South.
Harrenhal is currently gifted to Lord Varys, also known as the Spider, for his service during the Battle of Blackwater.
Dragonstone was originally the ancestral seat of power of the Targaryens, most recently held by Stannis Baratheon instead of Storm\'s End, his rightful inheritance.
Rhaegar Targaryen was born during the tragedy at Summerhall.
